trial_type.Description: Describes the type of stimuli including the instruction and valence of the image stimuli.

Levels.instruction: The instruction that denotes the action goal according to the valence of the image presented for the following 12 trials.

ActionGoal.Description: Describes the action goal of the trial.

Levels.Approach: The movement goal is to pull the joystick toward yourself on the current trial.
Levels.Avoid: The movement goal is to push the joystick away from yourself on the current trial.

RealAction.Description: Participant's movement direction on the trial.

Levels.Approach: The real action is to pull the joystick toward yourself on the current trial.
Levels.Avoid: The real action is to push the joystick away from yourself on the current trial.
Levels.NoMove: Participant did not make any movement within the response window (2s).

joystick_RTcal.Description: Time taken to start an action in response to the image on the current trial.
